short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Retrieves prices for Magic the gathering cards on gatherer.wizards.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Retrieves prices from TCGPlayer and CardHoarder and displays them directly onto Gatherer.wizards.com. Prices displayed are Highest listing, Lowest listing, and Average listing.
